named-query.name: Order.updateStatus
named-query.query: update Order o set o.status = :status where o.id = :id

named-query.name: Order.updateShipped
named-query.query: update Order o set o.shipped = :shipped where o.id = :id

named-query.name: Product.updateInStock
named-query.query: update Product p set p.inStock = :stockValue where p.id = :id

named-query.name: Product.updateInOrder
named-query.query: update Product p set p.inOrder = :orderValue where p.id = :id

named-query.name: Order.findByStatus
named-query.query: select o from Order o where o.status in :statusValues order by o.ordered
